alert.note: Alert for Coachella Valley; Riverside County Mountains; San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 18 at 2:29PM PDT until June 19 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 45 to 60 mph expected. Strongest winds will occur along Interstate 10 through the San Gorgonio Pass, and along the I-8 corridor into Imperial County. * WHERE...Desert slopes of the Riverside County Mountains, desert slopes of the San Diego County Mountains, Coachella Valley, San Diego County Deserts and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon until 11 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. Areas of blowing dust and sand can limit visibility at times.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Coachella Valley; Riverside County Mountains; San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
